alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HARRISON... SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL AND SOUTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dennison, or near Uhrichsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, Newcomerstown, Dennison, Gnadenhutten, Tuscarawas, Scio, Midvale, Jewett, Port Washington, Bowerston, Barnhill, Dellroy, Sherrodsville, Roswell, Leesville, Gilmore, Tippecanoe, and Stillwater. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 67, and between mile markers 77 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
